roleset.name: be composed of pieces

example.name: prepositional
example.text: The second part , consisting of $ 100 million of senior subordinated floating - rate notes , was priced at 99 3/4 to float 4.25 % above the three - month London interbank offered rate .

propbank.arg: of $ 100 million of senior subordinated floating - rate notes

example.name: verbal
example.text: The collateral consists of collateralized whole loans with a weighted average coupon rate of 11.08 % and weighted average remaining term to maturity of 28 years .

propbank.arg: of collateralized whole loans with a weighted average coupon rate of 11.08 % and weighted average remaining term to maturity of 28 years

roleset.note: CONSIST-V NOTES: Based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No verbnet entry. Comparison with 'exist'. (from consist.01-v)
